EmailTemplate.name: Rambler Inquiry
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We appreciate your interest in the Custom Logo Program, specifically the YETI Rambler drinkware line.
Currently, the Custom Logo Program includes only hard side coolers from the Roadie 20 up to the Tundra 65 and Tank 85.
If you are interested in custom logo Ramblers, please visit YETI Custom Shop, our exclusive partner for customizing the Rambler drinkware line.
Thanks again,
{!User.CommunityNickname} Business Development Team YETI 512.402.5895 corporatesales@yeti.com yeti.com
